column4: how do I check if my graphics card is running a Nouveau driver or a proprietary one?

I tInstall Bumblebee using the proprietary nvidia driver:
i think you`re right according to arch wiki.

In order to avoid installing nvidia-utils as a dependency when installing the nvidia driver, you have to install the nvidia-bumblebee package from the AUR instead (which is the same driver packaged for bumblebee usage).
just an info.. nvidia-current is a dependency as it is downloading it now hehe
